title: To gain Media Attention Model Aditi Singh Posing in Flooded Streets of Patna. Bihar Need Help !!!
Top Places to visit in Patna, Bihar
content: Patna is the capital and largest city of the state of Bihar in India. Patna is the second-largest city in eastern India after Kolkata.[9][page needed]It had an estimated city population of 1.68 million in 2011, making it the 19th largest city in India.
